pages.name: Health I
pages.text: Strengthens the structure of the turret chassis to gain 25% additional maximum health.$(br2)$(o)Note: These types of upgrades will not increase the turrets health automatically! You must heal it afterwards.$()

pages.name: Health II
pages.text: Strengthens the structure of the turret chassis to gain 25% additional maximum health. (in total: 50%)$(br2)$(5)$(o)Requires Health I to be installed.$()

pages.name: Health III
pages.text: Strengthens the structure of the turret chassis to gain 25% additional maximum health. (in total: 75%)$(br2)$(5)$(o)Requires Health II to be installed.$()$(br)$(3)$(o)Can only be applied to tiers 1-4$()

pages.name: Health IV
pages.text: Strengthens the structure of the turret chassis to gain 25% additional maximum health. (in total: 100%)$(br2)$(5)$(o)Requires Health III to be installed.$()$(br)$(3)$(o)Can only be applied to tiers 1-3$()
